TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TestScript extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A mock Test Script that can be used for unit testing of bot logic.
Docs.remarks: You can use this class to mimic input from a a user or a channel to validate that the bot or adapter responds as expected.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: If adapter is not provided a standard test adapter with all services will be registered.

Docs.param: The expected text of a message from the bot.

Docs.summary: Adds an assertion that the turn processing logic responds as expected.
Docs.returns: A new object that appends this assertion to the modeled exchange.
Docs.remarks: This method does not modify the original object.
Docs.exception: The bot did not respond as expected.
